device & web lock are not synced?

name: mqtt in explanation
info: send notification when door not closed and send command to turn off virtual lock and show noti

name: turn off alert on chart

info:
turn off alert on chart function will be executed in 2 cases: 
 1. On first loaded
 2. Right after danger alert is sent

 Danger alert gets fired and goes through the graph and turn off function at the same time. It will make sure to send 0 signal right after danger alert is triggered.
 Before writing the new lock status to the chart, it writes the old status value

name: door lock/unlock

info: to prevent messages from getting sent to fast -> infinite loop so we queue messages
